entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Typo on CodeGenDifferences.md file #59967

Closed

  • "ref" modifier is suggested for classes #59966
  • GetHashCode function generated from record does not null-check before calling `EqualityComparer<T>.GetHashCode` . #59964
  • A lot of invalid suggestions when creating class #59965

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed simple signature help bugs #59969
    Area-IDE
  • Fix type parameter scoping for local functions #59968
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Remove unused local #59963
    Area-IDE
  • Merge features/patterns-span-char to release/dev17.3 #59962
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59959
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Insert 17.2-p2 to VS rel/d17.2 #59952
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #59973
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #59972
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/required-members #59971
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #59970
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Editor namespaces refactoring - part 1 #59907
    Area-IDE
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid Large Object Heap allocations in GetPrioritizedPendingDocuments #59944
    Area-IDE
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • Fix pattern based arguments in ForEachLoopOperationInfo without binding assumptions #59887
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Break out embedded language classification (MEF side) #59905
    Area-IDE
  • Update integration tests to support both possible Go To Implementation results #59956
    Area-Infrastructure
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Check for prototype comments in separate job #59862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • CSharpImportAdder should be able to add the intended import if the identifier is a var #59947
    Area-IDE
  • SyntaxContext's GlobalStatementContext changes #59957
    Area-IDE
  • Add new feature to fix invalid constraints. #59889
    Area-IDE, Feature Request
  • Fix more lock contention #59638
    Area-IDE, 17.2.P2
